p:
For the further identification of the newly found morphology as possessing Pn3m symmetry, we try to check its known equivalent Wyckoff positions. Table 3 lists the first three Wyckoff positions along with their discretized coordinates and the local A block composition
ϕ A
(
r →
)
. As the overall variations in
ϕ A
(
r →
)
for each position groups are small, it is legitimate to claim that the given peculiar morphology belongs to the crystals of Pn3m symmetry.
